name: Classic Snakes and Ladders
description:
The best board game, Snakes and Ladders, has now come to your devices for exciting offline and online matches (with your friends, family and also with anonymous players across the world).

A classic board game, Snakes and Ladders (Called Ludo in some places, chutes and ladders in some places), is being played world wide across all age groups when a family or friends gathering for good times. My goal is to bring that exciting moment with this game.

You can see a better graphics (boards, players and dice), more customisability, clear game play and thus making the game as a best one available for Snakes and Ladders.

The game has several features which include,

+ 3 types of boards based on complexity (Kids, Expert and Pro)
+ Upto 4 Players can be played (Play Against System as well)
+ Play with your friends online via Private Match Rooms
+ Play with anonymous players across the world via Public Match Rooms
+ Chat with your opponents while playing the match
+ Very good graphics thus far for board games
+ Real-time Dice Throwing Dynamics
+ Player Names & Avatar Images
+ Pawn moving real time
+ You can also change the Magic Number (the dice number which will give you a chance to throw twice)

The objective of the game is to navigate one's game piece from the start (bottom square) to the finish (top square), helped or hindered by ladders (chutes) and snakes, respectively.

You can choose 2 or more players as System and you can just watching each System Players throwing dices, moving pawns and winning themselves, it is beautiful to watch as they compete with each other. :)
